description: In this Course You will se one of the populare methods that use by hackers to hack and access to any android phone or tablette in the world with a simple application that build a simple application wich make the attacker all the permissions to do many things with devices and it has the finale extension .apk & playing with victimes ...etc
title: Penetration Testing Android In Arabic
